original_text: And the sons of Jacob came out of the field when they heard it: and the men were grieved, and they were very wroth, because he had wrought folly in Israel in lying with Jacob's daughter: which thing ought not to be done.
korean_text: 야곱의 아들들은 들에서 이를 듣고 돌아와서 그들 모두가 근심하고 심히 노하였으니 이는 세겜이 야곱의 딸을 강간하여 이스라엘에게 부끄러운 일 곧 행하지 못할 일을 행하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Jacob came out of the field
because he had wrought folly in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이스라엘에서 어리석은 짓을 했기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: which thing ought not to be done.
